Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait' occurrences across all cases
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait' activities

Name: Percentage of process variants that include 'Accepted + Wait' as a step
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all cases

Name: Number of times 'Accepted + Wait' is directly followed by 'Completed + Resolved'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait' activities for cases where activity 'Completed + Resolved' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' that occur after 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment'

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait' in variants that eventually lead to 'Completed + Closed'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait' activities for cases where activity 'Completed + Closed' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' compared to the frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - User'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all 'Accepted + Wait - User'

Name: Number of process instances where 'Accepted + Wait' appears before 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait' activities for cases where activity 'Completed + In Call' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants containing 'Accepted + Wait' that have a performance duration above the median variant duration
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait' in cases that do not contain 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait' activities for cases where activity 'Completed + In Call' does not occur

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' occurrences that are part of variants with more than five activity steps
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of 'Accepted + Wait' to 'Accepted + In Progress' across the entire log
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all 'Accepted + In Progress'

Name: Number of times 'Accepted + Wait' is immediately preceded by 'Accepted + In Progress'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait' activities for cases where activity 'Accepted + In Progress' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' activities that appear in variants also containing 'Accepted + Assigned'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all 'Accepted + Assigned'

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait' in cases originating from the VINST incident management workflow that resolve without escalation to vendor or customer wait states
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait' activities == 'VINST' where ma is the last value of product

Name: Percentage of total waiting-related activities (including 'Accepted + Wait', 'Accepted + Wait - User', 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor', 'Accepted + Wait - Customer', 'Accepted + Wait - Implementation') accounted for by 'Accepted + Wait'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all cases

Name: Number of variants where 'Accepted + Wait' occurs exactly once and is followed by a resolution path ending in 'Completed + Closed'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait' activities for cases where activity 'Completed + Closed' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases containing 'Accepted + Wait' that never reach 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all cases where 'Completed + In Call' does not happen

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait' in high-duration variants (performance > 900,000 time units)
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait' activities

Name: Ratio of variants containing both 'Accepted + Wait' and 'Completed + In Call' to variants containing only 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all 'Completed + In Call'
